alert.note: Alert for Capitol Reef National Park and Vicinity; Castle Country; Glen Canyon Recreation Area, Lake Powell; San Rafael Swell; South Central Utah; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs; Western Canyonlands (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued July 14 at 2:42PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...A portion of Utah, including the following areas, Castle Country, San Rafael Swell, Wasatch Plateau/Book Cliffs, Capitol Reef National Park and Vicinity, Glen Canyon Recreation Area/Lake Powell, South Central Utah and Western Canyonlands. * WHEN...From Friday afternoon through Friday evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Deep moisture will remain over the area Friday, allowing showers and thunderstorms to develop. Any storms that develop will produce heavy rainfall with the potential to produce flash flooding. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Capitol Reef National Park and Vicinity; Castle Country; Glen Canyon Recreation Area, Lake Powell; San Rafael Swell; South Central Utah; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs; Western Canyonlands
